components: STEERING,SUSPENSION,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,POWER TRAIN,ELECTRICAL SYSTEM,VISIBILITY,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL
summary: THE TRANSMISSION AND BELT TENSIONER FAILED, THE AXLE HAD BROKEN,  THE HORN, WIPERS, AND CRUISE CONTROL FAILED.  THE A/C HAD GONE OUT ALONG WITH THE CONDENSER.  THERE WAS FLUID LEAKAGE IN THE POWER STEERING RACK & PINION,  THE VEHICLE HAD GONE DEAD. AS A RESULT THE COMPUTER WAS REPLACED.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED TO BE REIMBURSED FOR THE REPAIR COSTS.  SCC  *JB
